ultimateLeague.description: Application for managing sports leagues that allows users to create, edit, and delete teams, leagues, and matches. This project follows the MVC architecture pattern and is developed with PHP, Laravel, and MySQL. For user registration, management, and authentication, the Breeze package was implemented, while Tailwind CSS was used for design and styling.

blackjackAPI.description: A RESTful API based on the classic card game. It allows users to register, log in, update their nickname, delete their account, view a list of users, play games, and view global and personal rankings. Developed in PHP-Laravel and MySQL, it uses Passport for authentication and Spatie for role and permission management. Documentation was created using Swagger.

pokedex.description: Developed in React, this project was created as practice for learning how to consume APIs. It uses the PokeAPI to display detailed information about different Pokémon, allowing users to filter by name or type. By selecting a Pokémon, users can access its complete information. For design, I used a combination of Bootstrap and CSS to achieve an attractive and functional style.

laphotography.description: A photographic portfolio developed for photographer Lucas Angella, designed to showcase his work professionally. Created with WordPress and the Elementor plugin, the site includes organized galleries, a multimedia section, and multilingual support, allowing users to easily switch languages. This project was my first experience with these tools.

tilevania.description: A project for the GameDev.tv Team course, created with C# in Unity 2D using TileMaps. In this platform game, the player must traverse different levels, face enemies, and collect as many coins as possible. It features TileMaps, animations, cameras with Cinemachine, runtime object generation, sound effects, and a scene management system.

spaceBoost.description: A project for the GameDev.tv Team course, created with C# in Unity 3D using only primitive shapes. The player must reach the destination platform while avoiding various obstacles; the faster they complete the level, the more points they earn. It includes sound and particle effects, an input system, scene management, high score saving, and a lighting system.
